results.title: Effects of simvastatin and cholestyramine on bile lipid composition and gall bladder motility in patients with hypercholesterolaemia.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cholestyramine_Resin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002792 @@@cholestyramine@@@ on bile lipid composition and @<m>DISEASE_Gallbladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005706 @@@gall bladder@@@ motility in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with hypercholesterolaemia.

citations.NLM: Smit JW, Van Erpecum KJ, Portincasa P, Renooij W, Erkelens DW, Van Berge-Henegouwen GP. Effects of simvastatin and cholestyramine on bile lipid composition and gall bladder motility in patients with hypercholesterolaemia. Gut. 1995 Nov;37(5):654-9. PMID: 8549941
citations.BibTeX: @article{8549941, title={Effects of simvastatin and cholestyramine on bile lipid composition and gall bladder motility in patients with hypercholesterolaemia.}, author={Smit JW and Van Erpecum KJ and Portincasa P and Renooij W and Erkelens DW and Van Berge-Henegouwen GP}, journal={Gut}, volume={37}, number={5}, pages={654-9}}

results.title: Ezetimibe/simvastatin vs atorvastatin in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypercholesterolemia: the VYTAL study.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was also superior to @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ in attainment of LDL-C levels less than 70 mg/dL (P < .001 for all dose comparisons).

citations.NLM: Goldberg RB, Guyton JR, Mazzone T, Weinstock RS, Polis A, Edwards P, Tomassini JE, Tershakovec AM. Ezetimibe/simvastatin vs atorvastatin in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypercholesterolemia: the VYTAL study. Mayo Clin Proc. 2006 Dec;81(12):1579-88. PMID: 17165637
citations.BibTeX: @article{17165637, title={Ezetimibe/simvastatin vs atorvastatin in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypercholesterolemia: the VYTAL study.}, author={Goldberg RB and Guyton JR and Mazzone T and Weinstock RS and Polis A and Edwards P and Tomassini JE and Tershakovec AM}, journal={Mayo Clin Proc}, volume={81}, number={12}, pages={1579-88}}
